name: fish
dialogue: Hey buddy, I found this place first, so it's mine. Now scram!
Go find another hole. Plenty more out there.
But hey, you couldn't get me to go out there. No siree! Not with that big guy skulking about.
Hey, why don't you go try to distract him while I find a more spacious crevice.
Die? C'mon man, you won't die. I mean, probably. But if you DO die, you'll at least die knowing you helped some poor fish like me find a slightly larger hole to cower in.
